vlive.korean: 그래서 보통 저는 이거를 으깨서 족욕 할 때 쓰거나 제가 족욕기가 있거든요! So, I normally crush these and use them when I do a foot bath. I have a foot bath machine. 듣기 View video 카모마일T (Chamomile_T) : 러쉬 가디스 신제품 전제품 리뷰! / LUSH Goddess review
vlive.english: So, I normally crush these and use them when I do a foot bath. I have a foot bath machine.

vlive.korean: 얘를 가지고 살짝 으깨서 발라줄 거예요. 지금 보면 손이 이렇게 되어있죠? I will slightly crush it and put it on... You can see my hand like this right? 듣기 View video KKOSISTERS : 파워퍼프걸 아트 메이크업 The powerpuff Girls inspired Art makeup
vlive.english: I will slightly crush it and put it on... You can see my hand like this right?

vlive.korean: 아~ 두부 으깨서 넣는거네. Oh~ You actually mash with your hands. 듣기 View video IMFACT : [IMFACT] 릴레이 요리(feat. 임팩트는요리사)
vlive.english: Oh~ You actually mash with your hands.

vlive.korean: 계란을 으깨서 넣으시는 분들도 많고. Some people put mashed eggs on their toast. 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST W] 뉴블의 심야식당 - 오늘을 읽어주는 남자들 part.2
vlive.english: Some people put mashed eggs on their toast.

vlive.korean: 이렇게요? - 네 맞네요 이렇게 으깨서요. Like this? - Yeah. That's how you do it. 듣기 View video IMFACT : [IMFACT] 릴레이 요리(feat. 임팩트는요리사)
vlive.english: Like this? - Yeah. That's how you do it.
